评论概述: Size and Material Warning. Also, this is Not a Jacket.
评论详情: This is a SHIRT, not a Jacket. That said:  This runs larger than what you'd expect. I ordered a Large, going by the manufacturer's measurements, and it is at least 6" bigger around my waist.  The material is technically a cotton/linen blend, but here is the actual breakdown according to the tag: 30% Linen, 30% Viscose, 20% Polyester, 20% Cotton.  It is not really lightweight like an actual linen/cotton garment. It feels slightly heavier than an average dres-shirt. The polyester really shows through. The stitching is intact but lots of loose threads inside that I don't dare tug on.  I am highly disappointed. Returning it. :(

At this point, I have a variety of items from the COOFANDY brand, and I must say that I thoroughly enjoy every single last item. Ranging from shirts that are free flowing and loose, to more form fitting items that highlight one's body and build, they just don't miss in design. This particular shirt can be worn both closed and buttoned up and also open with another shirt showing underneath. It looks good and feels even better. One thing to note, is that the shirt is a bit thicker and heavier than other materials so plan out your outfit accordingly.

This arrived for me today and it is NOT as described. I'm not a big guy so I usually try a small or medium first. A small looks like a medium around the arms and an XL everywhere else. It is a truly bizarre fit. Like it'd be one thing if the whole thing just ran big, but these kind of proportions don't even make any sense. Who is this even for? No one outside of cartoons with this kind of body even exists. If $25 for what you're hoping is a nice shirt jacket sounds too good to be true, that's cause it is. I had a feeling this was the case, but I bought it knowing I've gotta get some other returns back anyway, and figured it was worth a try just in case it fit well. It did not. Back to Jeff you go, weird shirt jacket.

评论概述: Don't buy different fabric ver cheap different color
Lightweight Linen and Cotton shirt/jacket, with attractive collar.
评论详情: This shirt/jacket by COOFANDY fits as expected, and I recommend ordering your normal size. I like the collar design, and the lower front pocket placement, because it looks like shirts and jackets did back in the 1950’s. It gives this lightweight jacket a vintage look. The fabric used is a linen cotton mix, and feels mostly similar to 100% linen. This shirt jacket is best for spring and summer, because it is light weight. I wear mine with a T shirt underneath, and I get lots of complements on how I look.  This jacket washes well, with minimal shrinking and or fading. COOFANDY does a great job of making sure the seems are sewn well, and the buttons are fastened correctly. This is a great value for a spring/summer light shirt/jacket, with a vintage look.
